title: Bug 107299aspectpath inpath arguments fail without drive letter
description: ajc doesn't recognize Windows absolute file paths that don't start with a driveletter, e.g., run:ajc inpath \test.jar[error] build config error: bad inpath component: \test.jarbutajc inpath c:\test.jarworksajc aspectpath \test.jar Test.aj[error] build config error: bad aspectpath: \test.jarajc aspectpath c:\test.jar Test.aj(works)
